mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into fss_vote ( `id`, `title1`, `title2`, `title3`, `building`, `room`, `tel`, `name`, `create_time`, `from_ip`, `order_date` ) values ( #{id}, #{title1}, #{title2}, #{title3}, #{building}, #{room}, #{tel}, #{name}, #{createTime}, #{fromIp}, #{orderDate} )
